about_the_game:
Build powerful haciendas and use their modules to influence various areas of your islands.
Fulfill your dreams of owning a country estate and discover many ways to enhance it.
Introduce an island policy and benefit from the resulting boosts.
Discover new ways of producing goods from the old world into the new world, strengthening your resident’s independence, and increase your farms’ productivity massively by using the newly produced fertilizer.

PLAY THE NEW SCENARIO
Play as Vasco de Oliveira, sent to desertic islands to mine precious silver that must be delivered to the crown in time.
Face the challenges of seasons, plan your productions ahead and create an irrigation system that will help you survive the summer heat!
